originalText.text: I worked with Paul on my EB1 application. Paul is very well-versed with the process, was very generous with his time and feedback on my application, and acted as a true partner in the process, offering me valuable inputs on communicating my story and putting together a really strong package. He invested significant time and effort to research articles and publications to explain and strengthen the impact of the work that I had delivered in my professional capacity. My EB1 application was approved in the first attempt! I would strongly recommend him.

originalText.text: Paul is an excellent immigration attorney who worked with me on my successful EB1a application. He is very knowledgeable and well-versed with the requirements of the visa category. Throughout the process, he was able to guide me in crafting the best possible version of my petition. I highly recommend him for support with your immigration needs.

text.text: Paul is an excellent immigration attorney who worked with me on my successful EB1a application. He is very knowledgeable and well-versed with the requirements of the visa category. Throughout the process, he was able to guide me in crafting the best possible version of my petition. I highly recommend him for support with your immigration needs.

originalText.text: I started the EB2-NIW journey back in October 2023 with Paul. I had less than 12 months left on my H1B and my employer was not willing to sponsor me for an I-140. He provided a helpful starting point with templates and instructions on how to frame the personal statement to address the different prongs in the argument . After I received a RFE (which is very common and to be expected in this process), Paul guided me through the process of being extra specific. He  crafted a strong legal case for me based on the materials I could provide about my case. We worked together to leave no stone unturned in the evidence package.  In the end, my RFE response was approved within less than a week of submission! Not only was I able to get my own self sponsored I-140, I am able to extend my current H1B and my priority date is expected to be current very soon!

originalText.text: I worked with Paul on my EB1A application, achieving a successful outcome. I was recommended to Paul by a colleague. Paul and I worked together on developing a strong narrative for my application. Paul diligently reviewed and provided his expert opinion on how best to communicate my work and its impact, guiding me through the process of building a compelling case, supporting the requirements for an EB1A application. Paul’s very knowledgeable in various industries and has the ability to understand a wide array of technologies, their application and impact. Paul was always available for me via email or phone, and patiently talked me through the process, answering questions, providing feedback. Paul is dedicated, hard-working, resourceful and works with high integrity. I highly recommend Paul for Eb1A applications!

originalText.text: Paul helped me with my EB1A application. He is a rock solid lawyer, who has deep knowledge of the US immigration process and particularly for the most complex cases such as EB1A/B, NIW etc. Writing an EB1 application is a time consuming assignment, and unlike other lawyers who may take a cookie-cutter approach, Paul helps you build your individual case. I hired Paul after being disappointed with one of the other well known immigration lawyers. The application needed lots of iterations and I found Paul to be very patient, imaginative and direct. I believe he is one of the few lawyers who truly understands the role of financial industry and its applicability to immigration issues. I strongly recommend Paul for his premium immigration legal services. You won’t regret - but be prepared to work as hard as him!
